price: ߒ߬ ߡߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߊ߲߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߛߍ߬ߓߍ ߸ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߓߊ ߟߋ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
